name: Whistleblowing System – Mobile-Friendly communication form
author: Whistleblowing System Team

sections.description:
Whistleblowing system for internal and external anonymous reporting for companies.

Useful Links:

Website

It is a very simple whistleblowing system (whistleblower protection system) for anonymous reporting.
The companies can use it to comply with the EU Directive 2019/1937) and manage cases.
This solution follows the EU Whistleblower Directive of 2019 and the GDPR and helps the small and large organizations to comply with regulations.

Whistleblowing System Features

Two-way communication without registration on the website.

Intuitive Interface
Simple, confidential and anonymous reporting.

Two-way communication
Simple, confidential and anonymous reporting.

Mobile-Friendly and Responsive
Your forms will look great on all resolutions and devices: mobile, tablet, and desktop.

READY-MADE CONTACT FORM
The existing form can be integrated very quickly onto any page using a [shortcode].

CONFIDENTIAL OR ANONYMOUS INFORMATION
The user has the possibility to choose whether the contact should be anonymous or with e-mail address.

NOTIFICATION TO SELECTED EMAIL ADDRESS
It is possible to send a notification to any selected email address when a person has written a report

Form fields
The existing fields in the contact form can easily be shown or hidden with one click

World Class Customer Support

  • Low response time
    We always respond within a few hours.
  • Quick issue resolution
    Resolving an issue never takes more than 24 hours.

Privacy Notices

Whistleblowing System plugin does not collect and store any data of your users on Whistleblowing-form’s end. All data submitted by your website visitors is stored in your website database. From this perspective, you may be subject to GDPR compliance.

Whistleblowing System imply interaction between website visitors and website owner. As such you may publish forms that require input of Private data. You need to get explicit consent from your users to comply with GDPR. Under GDPR your users may request access and/or erasure of their entry data at any time. Here you can find how to export and/or delete submissions.
sections.installation:
After downloading the ZIP file,

  1. Log in to the administrator panel.
  2. Go to Plugins Add > New > Upload.
  3. Click "Choose file" ("Browse") and select the downloaded zip file.
    For Mac Users
    Go to your Downloads folder and locate the folder with the plugin. Right-click on the folder and select Compress. Now you have a newly created .zip file which can be installed as described here.
  4. Click "Install Now" button.
  5. Click "Activate Plugin" button for activating the plugin.

If the installation does not succeed, please contact us for help.

sections.reviews:
Just works

By chris4h on January 21, 2024

Useful plugin. Does what it says. Thank you!
